body_html:
I agree that tensor mutability would be incompatible with this, unless a copy-on-write approach were used under the hood. Can you think of other cases of shared tensor buffers in the core?

If impractical, we can close this PR and I'll try something else.

body:
I agree that tensor mutability would be incompatible with this, unless a copy-on-write approach were used under the hood.  Can you think of other cases of shared tensor buffers in the core?  

If impractical, we can close this PR and I'll try something else.
